page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT
page.content: A representative poll taken in the block shows that:Most inhabitants work either in Cambridge or within the block.Many fathers who work in the Abington area are self employed horticulturists or farmers.Other fathers are professionals such as engineers, scientists and directors.A few people work in London, Saffron Walden and Bishop Stortford and some more travel for work.Only a little over half the mothers work and those that do work, work part time and within the block ,mostly in Abington The block is served by good roads - A604 to Cambridge and the A11 and M11 to London.This makes the area attractive to people who travel,making our block a home and using the roads to travel to work.
